Package org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler

Class IntraSchedulerLeastRequested

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerSimple
org.lgdcloudsim.intrascheduler.IntraSchedulerLeastRequested
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatacenterEntity, Identifiable, Nameable, IntraScheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntraSchedulerRandomScore, IntraSchedulerRandomScoreByPartitionSynOrder
public class IntraSchedulerLeastRequested extends IntraSchedulerSimple
The intra-scheduler that implements the least requested scheduling strategy. It is extended from the IntraSchedulerSimple. It changes the scheduleInstances function to implement the least requested scheduling strategy. The least requested scheduling strategy is as follows:
  • Sort the instances by the resource requirements in descending order.
  • Get the same instances to schedule.
  • Filter scoredHostNumForSameInstance hosts and score them from a random start index. Note that the score will be cached in the scoreHostHistoryMap.
  • Schedule the same instances to the hosts with the highest scores one by one.
The score of a host that has met the requirements of the instance is calculated as follows: Score = (cpu remaining resources * 10 / total cpu resources + ram remaining resources * 10 / total ram resources) / 2
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous
